page.title: 07WHERE TO GO IN DIPTFORD
page.content: Our area is a good place for tourists. To the south lie many sandy {beaches}, very popular during the summer. To the North the Dartmoor National{Park 365 square miles of rugged beauty. So members of the Caravan Club will probably enjoy this area for its peace and quiet. There are two caravn sites locally. We also have Bed nd Breakfast in many houses and farms. There are a lot of Public Footpaths and there is the {river} Avon which you are able to fish for trout and sometimes salmon. The Avon is calm and quiet. Many tourists journey through our lanes and colourful hedgerows seeking tourist attractions.
